name: Lightsworn

skills.name: Teardown
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 10%.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Brutality
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff and a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Indomitable
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a [Revive on Death] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Sacred Order
faction.default_description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 53 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 47 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: For centuries the Knights of the Sacred Order were charged with cleansing Teleria of evil in all its guises. But since the declaration of war, they have sworn allegiance to the Queen of Aravia. In league with the Queen's Necromancer, these once-holy knights now enforce her Majesty's will and guard her chattel.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Lightsworn is a epic def champion from the faction Sacred Order doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Sacred Order, Lightsworn is a champion of Epic rarity and of Def type
structured_data.name: Lightsworn

default_description: Lightsworn is a epic def champion from the faction Sacred Order doing void damage
lore: The Lightsworn is a warrior of the Sacred Order who has devoted his life to defending the Order and its ideals. Armed with his heavy armor and mace, the Lightsworn puts his life on the line for both his Queen and his fellow brothers.
